definition: see 商城縣|商城县[Shang1 cheng2 xian4]
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: "Yinziwu" is warm in winter and cool in summer, making it a good place for living.
sentences.chinese: 洪江古商城的窨子屋冬暖夏涼，十分適宜居住。

sentences.english: This site is an online mall for home appliances.
sentences.chinese: 本網站是用於家電產品的網上商城。

sentences.english: Jingdong mall also unwilling to lag behind.
Companies located in China Yuzhong District Bund mall.
sentences.chinese: 公司位於中國重慶市渝中區外灘商城。

sentences.english: Not all malls have suffered from competition and the suburbs’ transformation.
sentences.chinese: 競爭和郊區的變革並沒有讓所有的商城都慘遭不幸。

sentences.english: If you look at the sky one night and…
sentences.chinese: 嗯，昨天晚上突然勁舞團的商城進不去了。

sentences.english: But Jingdong Mall is unlikely to look to list elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 但是京東商城未必會尋找別處上市。

sentences.english: Walk into every corner of China through the logistics of X-kicks. com.
sentences.chinese: 通過新新球鞋商城物流可以銷往中國任何一個角落。

sentences.english: After the split Taobao, Taobao Mall has been likened to Ma, "Liu and Deng."
sentences.chinese: 淘寶分拆之後，淘寶商城被馬雲比喻爲“劉鄧大軍”。

sentences.english: But this was the year that it made its power known.
sentences.chinese: 只是到了今年，蘋果的應用商城才顯現出其威力。

sentences.english: I'm not sure if Virtuemart would be the ideal solution for this.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否商城將是這個理想的解決方案。

sentences.english: As the economy develops, the various online shops appeared on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 隨着網絡經濟的發展，各種網上商城出現在網絡上。

sentences.english: 1, Responsible for E-commerce shop network platform operating working.
sentences.chinese: 負責公司天貓京東微信商城網絡平臺運營工作。

sentences.english: The handset commercial city is the network shopping system model application.
sentences.chinese: 手機商城就是網絡購物系統的典型應用。

sentences.english: R trademark application for Taobao Mall store margin of 100000.
sentences.chinese: 商標申請淘寶商城專營店保證金爲10萬。

sentences.english: The great mall integrates the finest from the great malls of the USA and Canada.
sentences.chinese: 大商城集美國和加拿大商城的最優秀設計於一體。

definition: Taobao Marketplace, a Chinese website for online shopping
brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
supermarket/abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场/CL:家[jia1]
